description: This scholarship was established in 1983 by Ann Shanks in memory of the late Warren Armstrong, an accompanist for the UCO Department of Dance. Eligibility Dance major Sophomore, junior, senior, or graduate student Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Dance   or SIS_Major is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Dance   or SIS_Major is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Dance Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Dance Education

criteria.description: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Fine Arts and Design   or SIS_College_2 is Fine Arts and Design

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
